blogPost.excerpt: Focus on what matters, from small tasks to life goals: - Spend your time doing things and reaching your goals - Stop wasting your time classifying things or measuring productivity. Minimalist and delightful design. No sign up. No ads. No data collected.
blogPost.body: Focus on what matters, from small tasks to life goals: - Spend your time doing things and reaching your goals - Stop wasting your time classifying things or measuring productivity. Minimalist and delightful design. No sign up. No ads. No data collected.
blogPost.title: Listed - The minimalist app for your to-dos & notes
blogPost.author: François Goldgewicht

localize.description: 专注于重要的事情，从小任务到人生目标。- 把时间花在做事情和实现目标上 不要再浪费时间去分类或衡量生产力了 简约而愉悦的设计。无需注册。没有广告。不收集数据。
localize.tagline: 为你的待办事项和笔记而设计的极简主义应用。

localize.description: 專注於重要的事情，從小任務到人生目標。- 把時間花在做事情和實現目標上 不要再浪費時間去分類或衡量生產力了 簡約而愉悅的設計。無需註冊。沒有廣告。不收集數據。
localize.tagline: 爲你的待辦事項和筆記而設計的極簡主義應用。

previous.title: Covid-19 hospitalizations in the US have declined 53 days in a row, down 69% from their peak on Jan 6. 🙏 https://t.co/64oEM5v8wM

localize.full_text: 科维德-19在美国的住院人数已经连续53天下降，比1月6日的高峰期下降了69%。🙏https://t.co/64oEM5v8wM。
科維德-19在美國的住院人數已經連續53天下降，比1月6日的高峯期下降了69%。🙏https://t.co/64oEM5v8wM。
